summary: A Forgotten keep/dungeon home for the player.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new home for the more thief oriented player. Inside of this wonderful forgotten cavern, there lies a bed, many chests, an arcane enchanter, and a forge, which makes this the perfect living area.

Location : To the left of Dragonsreach, in an abandoned sewer well.

Where is the key : In the Jarl's quarters of Dragonsreach on a desk.

This also includes a door that enters into the Whiterun Jail, so if you are escaping jail, you can escape directly into your home

Please report any bugs to me in the forums.


[u]Update Fixes:[/u]

*Added wooden planks to make for easier movement throughout the structure.

*mproved lighting sources (were none before)

V2.1 is coming in about a week now that I have more time, lot more improvements on the way.
author: lrolls123

files.name: Dragonsreach Forgotten Keep V2
files.changelogHtml:
Added wooden planks to make for easier movement throughout the structure.
Improved lighting sources (were none before)
V2.1 is coming in about a week now that I have more time, lot more improvements on the way.
